traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The aridni doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The aridni has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The aridni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells: * At will: dancing lights, detect magic, invisibility * 3/day: charm person, faerie fire, mage armor * 1/day: spike growth

actions.name: Short Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pixie Bow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slaver Arrows
actions.desc: An aridni can add a magical effect in addition to the normal damage done by its arrows. If so, the aridni chooses from the following effects: * **Confusion.** The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become confused (as the spell) for 2d4-1 rounds. * **Fear.** The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 2d4 rounds. * **Hideous Laughter.** The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become incapacitated for 2d4 rounds. While incapacitated, the target is prone and laughing uncontrollably. * **Sleep.** The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep for 2d4 minutes. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
